description.alert:
Results of this test are just indicative and should not alarm you.

In case the test marks you as positive, the result is merely a recommendation to further explore your case and contact your healthcare professionals.

In case the test marks you as negative but you are still doubtful you are encouraged to seek help from your healthcare professionals.
description.message:
The test below has been developed to help you identify if your symptoms match with the typical Corona Virus (Covid-19) and give you a guide to better understand how to take your precautions.

This guide is by no means replacement for your healthcare system or doctor, it has merely been developed to help you understand better your situation.

donate.text:
This website was published to increase people awareness about Covid-19 virus, you can use it at no cost and the author earns nothing from it.

Though **maintaining a website like this has costs.** 

If you think too that the pandemic crisis of these weeks needs to be contained in every possible way, please help us with a donation, so that we can keep on spreading the test and the awareness about Covid-19 dangerousness. 

Please, consider making a donation with the button below.

privacy.notice1: To guarantee the privacy of your health conditions, this website is completely anonymous, we don't use any kind of tracking devices to identify you and we don't save any of the test results.

share.text: If you too think that the pandemic of these weeks needs to be contained in any possible way, help us spread this test, **share this page to all your contacts.**

twitter.shareText: Covid-19 test,do the test to know your risk

test.text:
The test below bases its results on statistical data on the current pandemic contagion, and on the recommendations of the World Health Organisation. The results therefore do not replace your doctor's advice, but they can still be intended as recommendations to keep you and those around you safe.

To ensure an accurate response you should answer the following questions to the best of your knowledge and understanding.

**There are no wrong answers**
test.title: The test

precautions.text:
Every nation affected by the Covid-19 pandemic is responding autonomously to more or less everyone with the strategy of '**social distancing**', i.e. keeping citizens away from each other in order to contain and limit the contagion. 

This strategy has proved successful in China, and is proving its worth in other countries where it is used. 

In this article I will tell you some tricks to get through this period.

With 'social distancing' a nation generally imposes strong travel restrictions on its citizens, allowing them to leave home only for real needs: 

- medical examinations
- work (in some cases only for essential work)
- other needs (shopping, caring for the sick or other)
precautions.title: How to protect yourself, precautions

conditions.high:
Careful, it is **possible** that you are already infected. So we recommend that you **stay home** and avoid infecting other people. 

Covid-19 is so insidious, because in many people it manifests itself with light or even no symptoms, so the infected do not suspect that they are dangerous and continue their normal activities, helping to spread the epidemic.

There is no need to be afraid, the majority of the infected are not in serious danger and get away with a few days' rest, as in any flu. 
At this stage, however, it is essential that you stay at home, limiting contact with other people so as not to infect them. We recommend that you **call your doctor**. 

Also pay attention to your symptoms, if they get worse call your doctor (by phone, without leaving home) and follow his instructions.
conditions.low:
Congratulations, your symptoms have a **low compatibility** with Covid-19, so you're probably not infected.

**That's good news**, but it doesn't 100% guarantee that you're not infected or that you can let your guard down. There are also a lot of people infected, but with few or no symptoms at all. That's why we recommend you keep your guard up and your precautions high.

If you doubt this result we encourage you to contact your doctor for further examination.
conditions.mid:
Warning, your symptoms correspond to an **uncertain situation**.

Some of your symptoms correspond to those of Covid-19, but the data is not sufficient to make a prediction.

There is **nothing to worry**, but as we are not certain, we recommend you stay at home and take all precautions to avoid infecting other people. 

If you think you are infected, we especially recommend that you stay at home and contact your doctor for further checks. We recommend that you do not go out to avoid getting the infection or infecting others.
conditions.name: Are you sick with Covid-19?

exposure.high:
Warning, your habits, lifestyle and the context in which you live expose you to a **high probability** that you will enter or have already come into contact with the virus and contract it. 

Whether you are already infected or not, it is important that you **take extra precautions** and change your habits, increasing the care you take in protecting yourself and those around you. 

Your (high) risk of being infected and becoming contagious in turn exposes you and those around you to the dangers caused by the Covid-19 virus. That's why it's especially important that you avoid exposing yourself and protect yourself in all ways.
exposure.low:
Compliments, your habits, lifestyle and neighbourhood exposes you to a **low risk** of infection, it is unlikely (but not impossible) that you have been already or will soon be infected. 

You should not lower your precautions though, the situation could change very quickly and without notice. In particular even though you might keep your guard high, your neighbours might become infected, exposing yourself to higher risks.
exposure.mid:
Be careful, your habits, lifestyle and the context in which you live expose you to a **average risk**, 

So it is difficult to predict whether or not you have already contracted the virus, but you should start taking more precautions to reduce the risk of infection. 

That's why it's important that you protect yourself so that you don't contract it, or if you already have, protect others so that you're not responsible for any risks you expose them to.
exposure.name: Are you at risk of being infected?

gravity.high:
Warning, the test result indicates a **high probability** that if you contracted the virus you would have complications.

We encourage you to monitor your symptoms, in case of worsening contact your doctor specifying your conditions and following his instructions.

If you do not have any symptoms, please take extreme precautions to limit the risk of infection.
gravity.low:
Your physical condition and general health indicates that it is **unlikely** (but not impossible) that you would develop serious consequences from Covid-19. 

This is good news, but you should not lower your guard, as there have also been serious cases in perfectly healthy people. So it is good to use all precautions, also considering that you could become responsible for the infection of not so lucky people.
gravity.mid:
Warning, the test result indicates that you are at **average risk** of developing serious conditions from the virus.

You are not completely at risk of having a serious course, but you must still be careful and take your precautions, there have been serious cases even in perfectly healthy people. In addition, everyone who is infected is also contagious and risks making other people seriously ill.
gravity.name: If infected, what are the chances of developing complications?

category.no_data: Not enough info to give a result for the category "{{category}}"
